# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-date-scopes` will be documented in this file.

## v1.1.0 - 2023-05-02

### What's Changed

- support for custom created_at column names per model #5

## v1.0.6 - 2023-04-17

### Added

- method doc blocks for IDE auto-completion

## v1.0.5 - 2023-04-15

### Added

- test suite
- century scope

## v1.0.4 - 2023-04-15

### Fixed

- fixed overflow date units
- fixed singular scopes
- fixed second date unit

### Added

- added justNow scope

## v1.0.3 - 2023-04-14

### Fixed

- Fixed date overflows

## v1.0.2 - 2023-04-08

### Bugs

- fixed debug

## v1.0.1 - 2023-04-08

### Bugs

- fixed dependencies

## v1.0.0 - 2023-04-08

### Version 1

- lots of date scopes!
